activities: Information Network Associates will receive and process personal information (in paper and electronic form) in accordance with client instructions for the purpose of pre-employment background screenings and investigations.
industrysector: Legal Services - (LES)Computer Services - (CSV)Information Services - (INF)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
personaldata: All personal information collected by INA or provided by a client in electronic and paper form.
recoursemech:
Standardized forms will be provided for an individual to submit in the event of a dispute or disagreement regarding the use or personal information.  INA will work to resolve this dispute or disagreement within reason.  Unresolved complaints will be referred to a private sector dispute resolution mechanism adhered to the Safe Harbor Framework or EU/Swiss data protection authorities.

For complaints that cannot be resolved between the complainant and INA, INA agrees to cooperate with data protection authorities (EU DPAs) in the EU and Switzerland (Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)) (or authorized representatives) and participate in any dispute resolution procedures established by such authorities.
